caption.title: Vulnerability percentiles are greater in tracts with larger population densities.
caption.p: (a) Average vulnerability percentile (CES, HHAI, SVI) is plotted by log average population density of tracts (people per square kilometer, bin width of 2.5 percentiles, log scale). (b) This plot shows the frequency of different population densities across California’s census tracts (people per square kilometer, log scaled x-axis).
